text:
@PoliticsReid How is it possible that none of the Trumps nor the VP and his family have caught the novel Coronavirus. They are surrounded by people who have the virus and don’t wear masks.
What is the statistical probability? @deniswirtz #COVID19 #WhiteHouse #Quarantine
